Name: Wine jar
Description: This terracotta wine jar constitutes a lovely example of pottery at the beginning of the New Kingdom. The neck and shoulders are decorated with simple wavy lines and blue and red coloured bands.The lower part is painted entirely in red. The container is concieved as  an image of the goddess Hathor, patroness of music and dance. Under the protruding lip is shown a Hathoric head and on the shoulder two small buttons evoke the breasts of the goddess.
